Package org.apache.fop.render.bitmap

Bitmap Renderer which creates TIFF and PNG images from rendered pages.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BitmapRendererEventProducer Event producer interface for events generated by the bitmap renderers.
TIFFConstants Constants for TIFF output.
 

Class Summary
AbstractBitmapDocumentHandler Abstract IFDocumentHandler implementation for producing bitmap images.
BitmapRendererConfigurator Configurator for bitmap output.
BitmapRendererEventProducer.Provider Provider class for the event producer.
BitmapRenderingSettings This class holds settings used when rendering to bitmaps.
MultiFileRenderingUtil This utility class helps renderers who generate one file per page, like the PNG renderer.
PNGDocumentHandler IFDocumentHandler implementation that produces PNG files.
PNGDocumentHandlerMaker Document handler factory for PNG output.
PNGRenderer PNG Renderer This class actually does not render itself, instead it extends org.apache.fop.render.java2D.Java2DRenderer and just encode rendering results into PNG format using Batik's image codec
PNGRendererMaker RendererMaker for the PNG Renderer.
TIFFDocumentHandler IFDocumentHandler implementation that produces TIFF files.
TIFFDocumentHandlerMaker Document handler factory for TIFF output.
TIFFRenderer This class represents renderer to TIFF (Tagged Image File Format) format.
TIFFRendererConfigurator TIFF Renderer configurator
TIFFRendererMaker RendererMaker for the TIFF Renderer.
 

Package org.apache.fop.render.bitmap Description

Bitmap Renderer which creates TIFF and PNG images from rendered pages. Based on the Java2D Renderer.
